name: Core Spawn Emissary
languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

traits.Magic Resistance: The emissary has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Multiattack: The emissary makes three talons attacks.
actions.Talons: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d6 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.Alluring Thrum (Recharges 5-6): The emissary emits a dreadful yet alluring hum. Each creature within 20 feet of the emissary that can hear it and that isn't an aberration must succeed on a DC 14+1d6 + 11 Constitution saving throw or be charmed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.Crystal Spores (Recharge 6): A 15-foot-radius cloud of toxic crystalline spores extends out from the emissary. The spores spread around corners. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 14+1d6 + 11 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned in this way, a creature takes 11 (2d10) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
